title: What is the cost of a Google Mini in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google Nest mini is available on Flipkart at the price of Rs. 4000. Its MRP is Rs. 4500. It is also available at Reliance Digital online store at discounted price of Rs. 2800 with extra 10% cashback when bought through HDFC bank Credit/Debit cards. Hope this helps. If you've any queries, do ask me in comments section. Thanks for reading!! Chaitanya ✍🏻
